description:
BLOCK ARestoration of Rotunda ward block and change of
use to B1.  BLOCK B Restoration of former hospital
building (workhouse) and conversion and change of use to
residential (18 flats) BLOCK C Demolition of former
hospital building and construction of 19 residential
flats and basement car park.  BLOCK D Conversion of
hospital building to B1 use with additional roof space
storey. BLOCK E/F Conversion of former ward block to
B1 use.  BLOCK G/H Demolition of ancillary hospital and
residential building and construction of new building
comprising 26 flats and nursery.  BLOCK I Retention of
former laundry and conversion to community/public use.
New underground car park - 92 cars. *(Plans submitted)
Appeal received against the Council's failure to issue
their decision within the appropriate period.
